announcements.title: Welcome to ROID!
announcements.message: Thanks for using ROID - Your Roblox ID Program. Check for updates regularly!

announcements.title: New IDs Available!
announcements.message: 100+ new audio IDs have been added to the database. Click 'Check for Updates' to sync.

announcements.title: Scheduled Maintenance
announcements.message: Server maintenance scheduled for Nov 5th, 2025 at 2:00 AM EST. Auto-updates may be temporarily unavailable.
